meta.title: AWS - AI Agents and Tools
meta.subtitle: Content design for AI agent marketplace onboarding
meta.teaser: Technical documentation, UI writing, and content strategy for a major feature launch enabling AI agent creation in AWS Marketplace. Led cross-functional collaboration to align engineering, product, and design on terminology and user flows.

section.body:
Coming Soon

This is a new portfolio created in January 2026, and I'm still migrating all of my work here.

If you were hoping to read this specific sample or case study, you can contact me or connect with me on LinkedIn for the PDF version.
